title: Never Forget
author: VD
content_html:
God hates the wicked and He expects the righteous to hate what is false.

The righteous hate what is false, but the wicked make themselves a stench and bring shame on themselves.

  • Proverbs 13:5

DISCUSS ON SG
content_text:
God hates the wicked and He expects the righteous to hate what is false.
The righteous hate what is false, but the wicked make themselves a stench and bring shame on themselves.
Proverbs 13:5
